text:
Romina Francesca Power (born October 2, 1951) is an American actress and singer.
She appeared in several mainly Italian-language movies from the age of 14, including the 1969 version of the Marquis de Sade's novel "Justine", directed by Jesus Franco.
In 2005 Power was a judge in the Italian TV show "Ballando con le Stelle" ("Dancing with the Stars").
